title: Menu Modifier Group
description: Group of modifier options with selection constraints.

name.description: Display name for the modifier group.

minimum_selections.description: Minimum number of selections required from this group.

maximum_selections.description: Maximum number of selections allowed from this group.

max_per_modifier.description: Maximum quantity allowed per modifier option. Defaults to 1 (each modifier can be selected at most once). Set value > 1 to allow per-modifier quantities.

modifier_options.description: Available modifier options within this group.
